Package com.progmethgame.network

Interface ClientBusListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClientRuntime
    public interface ClientBusListener
    Client bus's event listener

      • onServerReady

        void onServerReady​(java.util.UUID assignedId)
        Server have initialized the client and is now ready. Always call after server finished sending entities and ready to display data.
        Parameters:
        assignedId - ID assigned by the server

      • onServerReset

        void onServerReset()
        Server instruct client to clear all game state. Always called first when client connect or level reset

      • onDisconnect

        void onDisconnect()
        Called when server disconnect eg. Connection lost, Server closed
